title: Congress: PDF Review Delegation & Cash Reserve Inquiry

reasoning.problem:
The influx of PDFs necessitates a structured processing approach. Each document should be delegated to its respective Department for review:

- Constitutional AI and neurophilosophy (Damasio) to the Department of Consciousness.
- Aristotle texts (Nicomachean Ethics and Politics) to the Department of Strategy & Research (AgentCivics).
- Financial papers to the Department of Wealth.

The rising cash reserves ($2455.00, exceeding the usual operational buffer) also warrant a congressional inquiry to ensure optimal resource allocation and compliance with Article III, Section 2 of the Constitution (Stagnation Veto).

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
